title: Adaptive eLearning Design for Customized Science Projects: Development of Adaptive Learning Experiences

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental scientific theories and experimental methods
context.additional_context: Customized science project implementation and assessment for learners in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can select adaptive e-learning content suitable for individual science projects with over 80% accuracy.
Learners implement three or more customized feedback sessions per project phase using smartphone-based tools.
Learners share five or more personalized learning strategies through a peer assessment system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
